subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Johnson Wagner got lucky bounces on two tee shots and shot a three-under-par 69 Saturday to take a one-shot lead over Chad Campbell after the third round of the PGA’s Houston Open in Humble, Tex. Wagner had a 15-under 201 total.
snippet: Johnson Wagner got lucky bounces on two tee shots and shot a three-under-par 69 Saturday to take a one-shot lead over Chad Campbell after the third round of the PGA’s Houston Open in Humble, Tex. Wagner had a 15-under 201 total.
